title: Lavinia Good Food
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Buffet, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A charming breakfast and lunch place in the historic city center serving daily fresh foods with at least 80% of the menu being vegetarian, of which some are vegan or can be  made vegan. Try the vegan pizzettas with in-house-made hummus, roasted eggplant and wild rocket and the speciality vegan cheesecake. From 11am-closing a large buffet is available which includes salads such as quinoa with roasted brussel sprouts. In the evenings owner offers lectures and workshops about living the healthy life. Private dining is also possible with a group 14-40 people. The atmosphere is homey, brick walls, easy going.
